item.title: Saved
item.description: Where hare you? Are you in the blue. Are you here in the stead. Are you here in my head. I feel the taste. Electric paste. The moment between moments. A calm buzz. A careening presumption. A black white hum. Subtle space. Can you feel me? Itâ€™s a special space. A 12 step process. Five planting. 7 climbing. Somewhere it is there. I wear it briefly. A sudden god.
